p: Moreover, these secondary metabolites are not only essential for plant protection and environmental integration of the containing species, but also possess various biological activities that may benefit human health, such as antioxidant [ 13, 14, 15], antibacterial [ 14, 16], antiviral [ 17, 18, 19], antifungal [ 20, 21, 22], and antitumor [ 9, 10, 23] effects.
